projects.name: OS-themed Portfolio
projects.description: Interactive portfolio website with an operating system theme, featuring draggable windows, a chat interface powered by AI agents, and smooth animations.
highlights: Built custom window management system with drag, resize, and minimize
Integrated AI agent for real-time portfolio interaction
Implemented first-person voice AI representative
Created beautiful animations and transitions

projects.name: Convexity Technologies Projects
projects.description: Leading development of CHATS, cNGN, StableRail, and Scrybit projects using modern technologies.
highlights: Leading engineering department
Building scalable blockchain and financial technology solutions
Implementing microservices architecture

projects.name: Foundry Agent Web Engine (AWE)
projects.description: Web engine for rendering static sites, particularly LinkedIn and Salesforce, using redis-based pooling system.
highlights: Implemented LinkedIn integration with redis pooling
Built Salesforce integration using Scratch Orgs
Developed PyPI package for developer integration
Optimized rendering performance with caching

projects.name: MyHives Core Services
projects.description: Designed and led development of core backend architecture, microservices, and full cloud infrastructure.
highlights: Built microservices architecture from scratch
Implemented full AWS cloud infrastructure using CDK and Terraform
Set up comprehensive networking with VPCs, load balancing, route tables
Scaled to support multiple tenants

projects.name: Isofy NAC System and Portal
projects.description: Network Access Control system with portal for managing network devices and user access.
highlights: Implemented remote NAC reboot functionality
Built roaming user support
Integrated with OfficeRND
Enhanced functionality and user experience

projects.name: Zarttech Critical Microservices
projects.description: Led development of critical microservices and software architecture for multiple projects.
highlights: Designed robust software architectures
Built scalable microservices
Implemented WebRTC and WebSocket communication systems
Set up real-time video conferencing with server-side recording

projects.name: KYC Mobile Application
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile app for Know Your Customer verification with face detection and identification.
highlights: Built face detection and identification system
Deployed to both iOS and Android
Configured CI/CD pipelines for automated builds
Integrated with backend verification systems

projects.name: Cryptocurrency Mining Backend
projects.description: Backend system supporting cryptocurrency mining rigs with blockchain transaction capabilities.
highlights: Built system to create, sign, and broadcast Bitcoin and Ether transactions
Integrated with mining hardware
Implemented real-time monitoring and control
Used Django Channels for WebSocket communication

projects.name: Carilo Bidding Platform
projects.description: Platform for package bidding with real-time notifications and cross-platform mobile app.
highlights: Built module for broadcasting new bids in real-time
Created iOS and Android mobile applications
Implemented landing page with React
Used WebSocket for real-time updates

projects.name: Multi-Tenant School Management SaaS
projects.description: Scalable SaaS solution for school management used by multiple schools in Nigeria.
highlights: Built multi-tenant architecture supporting multiple schools
Scaled on AWS using ELBs, EC2s, and Lambdas
Implemented real-time features with WebRTC and WebSocket
Trained junior developers and IT students
